Entries.DialogueText: Did you watch the game last night?
Or wait, do you even have a TV set...?
Ugh, I stepped in something gross earlier... and I just bought these shoes.
Hey, hey, hey! You rememb--
...*sniff*...*sniff*... what's that gnarly smell...?
Hey, hey, hey! You remembered! Now that's what I'm talking about!
Aw yeah... Pizza time!
Whoaa... Hold on... this is for me? I never expected this! Thank you!
Wait... what?!
I thought we were doing okay... I guess I was way off... alright, then.
Yeah, sure... we can still be friends.
Um... So, can I get a kiss now?
I couldn't sleep last night. I was imagining all the things we're gonna do together.
I heard you and Sebastian are going out... he better still be coming to band practice every week!
I'm sorry, . I don't think I can still be your friend.
Hey, you know what? That's exactly the kind of style I've been thinking about... for the band.
Oh, I see.
Yeah... That's what happened!
${He's
She's}$ right... That's what happened.
What!? ${He's
She's}$ lying!
Even with all the practice we did, I made a bunch of mistakes on stage... I hope no one noticed.
It's kind of nerve-wracking to be in front of everyone!
I better lay low for a while. I wouldn't want to get on Mayor Lewis' bad side!
Wouldn't it be cool if the town had a skate park, though?
Now, how to convince Mayor Lewis...
If... I mean when... my Dad gets back, I wonder if he'll be the same as I remember him?
Hi .
Hmm.. I wonder if I could grow a cactus in my room?
I ordered some shoes online more than a week ago! Man, they're really taking a long time.
I guess we must really live in the middle of nowhere.
Ah, my feet feel great in these new shoes. They're a little crisp, but they'll break in. Especially after I run through the haunted maze this weekend.
Tonight, after everyone is asleep, that weird old man who lives in the woods will set up the haunted maze. He always makes sure no one is around to see him working.
I ordered a new pair of shoes online. They're the same style so I know they'll fit right.
I used to live in Zuzu City, you know. The biggest difference is the noise. It's never quiet in the city.
There's way more people around you, always. And it's always bright with city lights, even at night.
I guess which setting you like depends on your personality.
I think I've grown to like the country more than the city.
Although I could be biased... for a certain reason.
So, how are you doing today?
Oh, hi. Are you making friends with anyone in town?
Bye.
I like taking walks in the forest this time of year. The temperature is so comfortable.
Hmm. I think I was meaning to do something... But I forgot.
This happens to me all the time.
I'm lucky to have the biggest room in the house to myself.
I guess there's advantages to being the oldest child.
It's hard to have fun on Sunday... I keep thinking about having to go to work tomorrow.
The first week of fall is already over. Man, that went by fast.
Whatever. I'm just happy that you came to visit me!
So do you have anything new to tell me?
Did you ever notice all the spider webs that appear during the fall?
If you get up early you'll see them covered in dew... like little stars.
I guess I should start thinking about moving out soon...
...But I would miss Mom's fish casserole, so I dunno...
I hate making decisions.
I think my Dad might be coming back next year.
I guess that's kind of soon. Weird.
My shoes always seem to wear out this time of year. Look, my toe's poking through!
That's what happens when you skateboard too much.
Hi, . Do you want to hang out or something?
Just stop by whenever you want.
Hey... something smells good, like pizza.
Do you smell that? Maybe Mom's cooking something.
Heheh... So you've been to the sewer, huh? I've snuck down there a few times myself. It's pretty creepy.
How could I tell? Hmm... let's just say... 'the nose knows'.
Oh... with me? Hehe... Yeah, sure. Sounds fun!
Aw, I gotta put on that dorky suit again? I thought now that we're married... Well, alright.
Hmm... I dunno. Maybe next year.
Did I ever tell you we used to live in the city?
There's a lot more stuff going on, but it's also kinda noisy and hectic... It's hard to say which is better.
The older I get the more attached I feel to the valley.
Dad used to work as a garbage man in the city.
You don't even want to know some of the things he found in people's trash.
Whaa! Is it acid? Will it burn through the roof and sizzle us alive?
I gotta keep my little brother safe!
You notice how warm this rain is? It feels alive...
Seems like there's no damage to anything... That was a strange one. How are you holding up?
Hey, I'm Sam. Good to meet you.
Hey, what's the big idea? You took my drummer!
Haha, just kidding... Congrats!
Wow, I can't believe you and Sebastian got hitched. Times really are changing...
Eh, it's alright, I'm sure he'll still have time to hang out.
Hey, farmer.
Hey, how's it going?
Last night I practiced guitar for 4 hours straight. My fingers hurt like crazy.
Bye, I've got something to do...
I'll tell you a secret... my name 'Sam' is short for 'Samson'.
Most people don't know that so keep it on mute.
I bet there's some cool stuff deeper on the island.
Willy said we have to stay here, though... some kind of liability issues or something.
I'm just getting juiced up, then it's back to the beach.
Wow, what a spot!
I'm feeling pretty good from all the sunlight.
Check out these gnarly waves... Guess what? I'm gonna save up for a surfboard.
is playing a jazzy tune on his guitar.
Maybe I should learn to play the ukulele.
Abby on the congas and Sebastian on the steel drums... 'The Pelicans of Paradise'...
What's the matter, you look worried.
Hmm. I just remembered that I was meaning to do something... But I forgot.
Oh! I just remembered I'm supposed to call my Grandma. Okay, I'm going to put this rubber band on my wrist so I don't forget.
I have to make little reminders for myself or else I'll totally forget to do things.
Alright, I'm done with the cold shoulder act. Let's just forget about what happened.
My little brother gets so excited for festivals. He's been talking about tomorrow's egg hunt all day.
Sometimes those spring petals that float around make my nose drip.
I like summer best, myself.
Why couldn't the flower dance be today so I could get work off?
I don't have to work tomorrow! I've never been so happy.
You know... I used to live in the city and I have to admit, this place is much nicer in the summer.
The city is so hot with all that concrete.
There's a little less pollen in the summer... my nose is really happy.
I'm hungry.
See you later.
Have you been to the desert yet?
You can find some interesting things there. Dad took me a couple times when I was younger.
When you see hot air balloons drifting over the sea, you'll know that summer's in full swing.
Dad was telling me about our national enemy, the Gotoro Empire... They sound like a ruthless bunch.
Sometimes I can hear my Dad pacing down the hallway at night.
...But he won't tell us what's troubling him.
Oh, hi! It's good to see you again.
Goodbye for now.
I'm so energized during summer I hardly have to sleep!
Hi. Taking the day off?
Sounds interesting.
I saw a spider on my ceiling last night. They sure like the warmth.
I hope he didn't crawl into my mouth while I was asleep...
Oh, it's a nice day... isn't it?
Sometimes I wonder if my mother is actually happy with her life...
I asked her once and got the feeling she was hiding some inner pain.
The clouds look great this time of year, don't they?
Like scoops of vanilla ice cream floating on blue raspberry sauce... Or maybe I'm just hungry.
Well, my Dad is back. Have you met him?
I'm just glad he's okay.
*sigh*... what am I still doing here?
My Dad is a soldier, fighting against the Gotoro Empire. That's why he's not here...
He'll come back someday.
...I've heard some terrible things about the Gotoro Empire...
I think my Dad might be coming back in a year or so.
I guess you might be able to meet him, then. If you're still living here.
You wouldn't abandon the farm after putting so much effort into it!
...I have mixed feelings about my father being back. He seems strange.
But I guess I haven't seen him in 3 years... so that could explain it.
Take it easy.
Sleeping feels nice but sometimes I wish I could skip it... it's just such a time-waster.

I'm trying to come up with a new song for my band, but I'm blanking...Hey.. What do you think my new song should be about?Farming, mining, and chopping wood.A city in the sea.Choose anything. It'll still be a horrible song.
Hey, man... what the heck is your problem? Sorry I asked.
Hey, you know what? That sounds perfect. Thanks!
19#But I already know what you think about it.|Thanks to your help I'm already done with the lyrics!
Hey buddy. You look like you're full of energy today!
. Um... I just wanted to say... You look nice today.
I've been friends with Sebastian for a while. He's a pretty cool guy.
If you two weren't around I wouldn't really have any friends in town.
The Feast of the Winter Star is supposed to be a time to show gratitude for all the good things in life.
Me? I'm mostly interested in the food. Hehe.
One time, Gus fell in the river during the Ice Festival. We had to build a huge fire in the saloon to dry him out.
We were all worried we'd never taste his famous spaghetti ever again.
The worst thing about the snow is getting your feet soaked. You're lucky in those thick boots.
Hi... Cold, isn't it?
Everyone's indoors during the winter, so I can play guitar as loud as I want.
I just remembered I need to change the strings on my guitar.
Okay, I'm going to write a note on my wrist so I remember to do it tonight.
Try not to make a mess in the house or my Mom will flip.
It would be fun if we could go sledding, wouldn't it?
I don't think there are any good hills nearby.
Plus, I don't have a sled.
So, how have you been doing lately?
My Dad is in the military, fighting against the Gotoro Empire. That's why he's not here.
He's coming back soon, though.
One thing that's nice about winter... all the mosquitos are gone.
Dad's been back for a while now. I guess I'm finally getting used to it.
I think my Dad is coming back this spring.
It's been 3 years since I've seen him. This is going to be strange.
Well, it's a good time of year to catch up on all the sleep I've missed.
Joja#I hate working at JojaMart, but how else am I going to make money in this town?|I'm glad I work at the museum now. It's way more interesting than that depressing JojaMart ever was.
I'm going to be really happy as your husband, .
I'm excited.
I never dreamed this would happen. I'm so lucky.
I can't wait till the wedding.
Hello . Nice day, isn't it?
I'm just keeping an eye on my little brother. It's good for him to get some fresh air on a day like this.
Our Dad used to take us to the beach on sunny days like this.
Of course, Vince. Dad's going to come back as soon as he possibly can.
Don't believe everything you hear!
Don't you remember how strong Dad is? He'd never let a pathetic Gotoro grunt get him like that! Don't you worry!
And always remember that Mom and I are here to play with you if you ever feel lonely.
To be honest, I have no idea if my old man will come back... We've all read the reports. Our soldiers are falling by the thousands.
But what am I going to say to Vincent?
Hey did I tell you the band's starting to come together?
Yeah! It turns out Abigail's a pretty good drummer. And Sebastian seemed to really want her in the band...
You did the right thing. Kids should have hope.
You think so?
Maybe you're right... The world is a cruel place, but kids have to learn that one way or another.~Yeah... kids should play and have fun while they still have the chance.
Hi . Thanks for coming.
Well, our gear's loaded already... Looks like everything's set.
Alright, everyone... let's get in the bus!
*gulp*... I'm starting to get really nervous.
Okay, here we are... wish me luck!
Hey. The show was a great success! Thanks again, .
Hi . Guess what? My band is playing a show tonight, in Zuzu City!
Meet me at the bus stop around 4:00 this afternoon to leave for the show. You better be there!
I'm excited and a little nervous for the show tonight. I'm sure everything will turn out okay.
Oh, hey . You look like you've been working hard out there!
Hey, I was just thinking...
You know, I really like living here with you. I mean... I love it!
But, I feel like I've gotten really lazy. I just bum around aimlessly every day.
Oh, I know you don't mind! You make enough money on the farm that I don't really need to work, and I really appreciate that!
But I want to feel like I'm contributing to something... know what I mean?
So... I think I'm gonna try to find some work... something to do with music.
That's always been what I love the most!
Oh, uh... besides you, of course!
Heh...
Anyway... I'll let you know how it goes!
Hey , listen to this!
'Dear Sam, we are pleased to offer you a position as 'junior composer' at Zuzu Broadcasting Group, TV division...'
Wow! Music for a TV show! How cool is that?!
Oh... Hold on...
... It's a TV show for little kids... 'The Happy Junimo Show'
Not exactly what I had in mind...
I guess I'd better start 'thinking like a kid'...
Oh...
Hey!
Hmm... Yeah, I guess that's one way to look at it.
I mean... you're right, someone's gotta make children's music. But it's not exactly a 'dream job'...
Ah well... that's okay. I'll make the best of it, like I always do.
I'll be working on this for a few days.
Hey, . I'm making progress on the song... check it out.
It's kinda bare-bones right now... but when I add in all the different instruments, it'll come together. You'll see.
You know... I'm not too upset about this kid's show idea anymore.
You gotta start somewhere, right?
And hey, maybe I'll be a big hit in the children's concert circuit!
I'll have the finished song ready soon. I hope they're happy with it!
Okay, okay, Vince... I'm gonna put the song on right away.
Now, you gotta listen really close, so you can tell me if you like it afterwards. Okay?
Wow! I wasn't expecting such an overwhelming response!
That's great! This is really fun!
Hey, thanks for all the support with this.
You know... I kind of like making children's music. It's not very glamorous, but I'm making these kids really happy. That's important!
Here, I wanted to give you this. It's a boombox with the song on it... So you can listen to it whenever you want.
I'm just glad to know that my music makes people happy...

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Saloon/195013/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f Sam 2500/f Harvey 2500/f Alex 2500/f Elliott 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 911526/e 528052/e 9581348/e 43/e 384882/e 233104/k 195099
Entries.DialogueText: Never thought you'd find all your 'boyfriends' in one room, huh ?

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Saloon/195013/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f Sam 2500/f Harvey 2500/f Alex 2500/f Elliott 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 911526/e 528052/e 9581348/e 43/e 384882/e 233104/k 195099_1
Entries.DialogueText: Well, we're not going to put up with your abuse any longer!

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Saloon/195013/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f Sam 2500/f Harvey 2500/f Alex 2500/f Elliott 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 911526/e 528052/e 9581348/e 43/e 384882/e 233104/k 195099_1_1
Entries.DialogueText: We all know the truth, now! And we're not going to tolerate this!

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Saloon/195013/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f Sam 2500/f Harvey 2500/f Alex 2500/f Elliott 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 911526/e 528052/e 9581348/e 43/e 384882/e 233104/k 195099_2
Entries.DialogueText: ...so we've come to a decision... isn't that right, fellas?

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Saloon/195013/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f Sam 2500/f Harvey 2500/f Alex 2500/f Elliott 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 911526/e 528052/e 9581348/e 43/e 384882/e 233104/k 195099_3
Entries.DialogueText: We're all giving you the cold shoulder!

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Saloon/195013/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f Sam 2500/f Harvey 2500/f Alex 2500/f Elliott 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 911526/e 528052/e 9581348/e 43/e 384882/e 233104/k 195099_alt
Entries.DialogueText: Not so fast!
...I think we've come to a decision... isn't that right, boys?
Liar!
Oh, hi ! Sebastian and I were just having a little 'jam session'.
We're trying to start a band, but we still don't know what kind of music to make. There's too many possibilities.
Say, ... what kind of music do you like?Cheerful pop music.Experimental noise rock.Hi-Energy dance music.Honky-tonky country music.
What do you say, Sebastian? Should we do this?
Thanks for the help, . With my guitar skills, and Sebastian's wizardry on the synthesizer, we're gonna be a screaming success. I'm convinced of it!
Now I just need to find someone to play drums...
Oh, hi . I was just about to have a snack.
Here, let me get something for you.
Oh no... What a mess.
80 null 80 -10 event_snack1 80 50 event_snack2 81 -50 event_snack3#Sam dropped it on purpose. He thought it would be funny.
I'm sorry about this, mom. I'll clean it up.
...Yes, ma'am.
I see...
I'm sorry... I had the wrong idea. I'll see you around.
I always knew there was something special between us...
I'm going to be thinking about this night for a long time...
Cool... , are you ready to choose your character?
Cool. Warrior's my favorite anyway.
Choose your character:Healer. I prefer to help others.#Wizard. A sharp mind is the most powerful blade of all.
Thanks, .
Sebastian casts 'Pure Bolt'... A beam of white light hits Xarth square in the face. The Dreadlord shrieks and crumbles into dust.
You pick up the Solarion Staff and hold it high. Order has been restored to the world.
I guess I'm stuck with the healer.
I wanted to talk to you in private...
It's kinda cold out here though... let's sneak into my room.
Alright, I said it.
I know I've been talking about nothing but the band for a while now... But I don't want you to think that's all I'm interested in.
Um... Er... What I mean is...
Well, I'm really happy that we've grown so close... Heh.
... do you think of me as... just a friend?
Quick! Hide in the bed!
No Mom! I was just... doing push-ups! I wanna beat Dad at arm-wrestling some day! ...heh.
Goodnight, Mom.
Whew... That was close.
Earlier, I was trying to say... that I really like you, . I think we could really have something special together... Know what I mean?
Stay put.
Head for the window.
Uh... Er... I... I'm sorry, sir.
Yes, sir.
...Did you see that trick, though? That was rad.
Hey, don't look in there!
I feel like I've changed a lot from when we first met... you know?
...you might call it 'maturity'... hehe.
But I'm at a place, now, where I'm actually really excited about our future together...
Even if that means just doing normal stuff, like... uh... buying groceries and changing diapers... hah...
Sebastian's the same as always. Are you having fun at the festival?
Hey . Having a good time?The slingshot tent is pretty fun, and if you get good at it you can really rack up the star tokens.
Hey, are you enjoying the festival? I'll be rooting for our grange display!Psst... If you're going to bet your tokens on the wheel... bet on green!
Ugh... I gambled and lost it all to the spinning wheel...I should've went with green.
Hey, I was wondering when you'd show up!
That's odd... It's just a dead end up ahead.I could've sworn there was someone ahead of me when I went through the maze, though. Where'd they go?
My little brother and I made it pretty far in here but we got stuck.You go on ahead... find that treasure for us!
Am I Sam? Heh, heh, heh...
The gang's just the same as always. Are you having a good time?
*sniff*... ub... my doze... allergies...
You know what? I admit it... I really like flowers!
Whoa, you look really great today.
*sniff* I'd enjoy this get-together more if it wasn't for my allergies. I'll just have to suck it up!
I guess it wouldn't be very nice to put something nasty in the soup...
Governor? Who cares...Why should I care about some random old guy?
That soup is smelling zesty...Did you add something good? I'm getting hungry!
Next year, I gotta remember to bring my electric guitar... Imagine a solo at this part of the song!
I wonder if they're poisonous?Maybe I shouldn't push Sebastian in the water after all...
Wow... you look great tonight!
Summer is drawing to a close. I'm gonna miss the long days!
*yawn*... I'm here for the gifts and the cookies.
I'm thankful for my guitar and my skateboard. Oh, and my family I guess.
It's kinda fun watching everyone unwrap their presents... seeing their reactions.Oh yeah, I got you something. I'll uhh... show you when we get back to the farmhouse!
Who gifts someone a Joja basket?...
Aren't you cold? Are you sure you don't want my jacket?
Hey, . Are you gonna enter the ice fishing competition?Oh, not me. I don't know how to fish.
You should teach me how to use a fishing rod sometime. I think I'd be good at it.
Hey, why are you laughing? He's not even done yet!You just wait... once we're finished, he'll be one fine snowman.
Aw, yea! This is my absolute favorite!
Thanks! I really like this.
Hmm.. this is... interesting.
You really don't get it, huh?
You got that for me? Thanks!
